summary: "Miseria e Nobiltà" tells the story of the humble families of Felice Pasquale and his colleague who are hired by a Marquis who wants to marry the daughter of a rich but simple cook, So they pose as aristocrats.
cast: Totò|Sophia Loren|Enzo Turco|Dolores Palumbo|Gianni Cavalieri|Franca Faldini|Carlo Croccolo|Liana Billi|Giuseppe Porelli|Giulia Melidoni|Valeria Moriconi|Franco Pastorino|Franco Sportelli|Franco Melidoni|Leo Brandi|Franco Caruso|Dino Curcio|Nino Di Napoli|Nicola Maldacea Jr.|Vera Nandi|Enzo Petito
title: Miseria y nobleza
